name: Sistem Informasi Akademik MPLB - SMK LPPMRI 2 KEDUNGREJA
description: A comprehensive digital learning platform for 10th-grade students in the Office Management and Business Services (MPLB) major at SMK LPPMRI 2 KEDUNGREJA. This platform includes a student portal and an admin panel, featuring material management, interactive assignments, attendance, real-time notifications, and announcements.
